title: Assistance for General Discussion Posting
body:
Good evening, 

I am experiencing an issue with the permissions to post in the general discussion boards. I am conducting a survey for class and would like the assistance of the league community to complete my project. The board is proclaiming that I must be level 7 or higher to post. How may I achieve level 7? Thank you for you assistance.

replies.body: Heya, your profile just needed to sync up to the boards.  There is also a [syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)if you run into anymore hiccups!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iPz5U9UU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-06T23:35:11.967+0000)
>
> Heya, your profile just needed to sync up to the boards.  There is also a [syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)if you run into anymore hiccups!

Thank you so much! Your assistance is a godsend.
